TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlArrayItemAttributes extends System.Collections.CollectionBase

span.span: Represents a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別可讓您指定可插入陣列公用欄位或公用讀取/寫入屬性所傳回的衍生型別。The class allows you to specify the derived types that can be inserted into an array returned by a public field or public read/write property. 此類別的執行個體由屬性類別。An instance of this class is returned by the property of the class. 類別用在覆寫一組插入到其中的陣列物件已套用。The class is used when overriding the set of objects that can be inserted into an array to which the has been applied. 針對您想要的欄位或屬性，以接受每個新類型，建立並用將物件加入至所傳回的集合屬性。For each new type you want the field or property to accept, create an and use the to add the object to the collection returned by the property. 至，指定的欄位或屬性，包含的物件類型和欄位或屬性的名稱。 the to an , that specifies the type of the object that contains the field or property, and the name of the field or property. 建構具有再呼叫或方法。Construct an with the before calling the or method.
